name: 陳柏壽
objective:
Chinese Description: 社會中的經濟活動愈來愈複雜，無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可能性中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中洞察先機。
English Description: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.
schedule:
1   Connotation and application of economic
2   Scarcity and competition and utility
3   Configuring airport and Opportunity cost
4   Marginal benefits and marginal costs
5   Economic way of thinking
6   Production Possibilities Frontier
7   Economic growth
8   Law of demand and supply
9   Mid-term exam
10   Bubble economy
11   Economic and social issues
12   Economic recovery
13   Rise of a different world
14   After the financial turmoil, economic
15   Economic trends
16   Trade deficits and the housing bubble
17   The direction of the economy
18   Final exam
